lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:08.15]I got this feeling inside my bones
[00:12.28]It goes electric, wavey when I turn it on
[00:16.53]All through my city, all through my home
[00:20.76]We're flying up, no ceiling, when we in our zone
[00:24.46]I got that sunshine in my pocket
[00:27.42]Got that good song in my feet
[00:29.51]I feel that hot blood in my body when it drops
[00:33.93]I can't take my eyes up off it, moving so phenomenally
[00:38.08]You gon' like the way we rock it, so don't stop
[00:42.00]Under the lights when everything goes
[00:46.18]Nowhere to hide when I'm getting you close
[00:50.46]When we move, well, you already know
[00:54.77]So just imagine, just imagine, just imagine
[00:59.82]Nothing I can see but you when you dance, dance, dance
[01:03.64]Feeling good, good, creeping up on you
[01:05.74]So just dance, dance, dance, come on
[01:08.28]All those things I should do to you
[01:10.31]But you dance, dance, dance
[01:12.19]And ain't nobody leaving soon, so keep dancing
[01:15.92]I can't stop the feeling
[01:18.55]So just dance, dance, dance
[01:20.26]I can't stop the feeling
[01:22.74]So just dance, dance, dance, come on
[01:25.57]Ooh, it's something magical
[01:28.67]It's in the air, it's in my blood, it's rushing on
[01:32.94]I don't need no reason, don't need control
[01:37.20]I fly so high, no ceiling, when I'm in my zone
[01:40.94]Cause I got that sunshine in my pocket
[01:43.76]Got that good song in my feet
[01:46.00]I feel that hot blood in my body when it drops
[01:50.33]I can't take my eyes up off it, moving so phenomenally
[01:54.57]You gon' like the way we rock it, so don't stop
[01:58.39]Under the lights when everything goes
[02:02.66]Nowhere to hide when I'm getting you close
[02:06.91]When we move, well, you already know
[02:11.30]So just imagine, just imagine, just imagine
[02:16.32]Nothing I can see but you when you dance, dance, dance
[02:20.03]Feeling good, good, creeping up on you
[02:22.19]So just dance, dance, dance, come on
[02:24.79]All those things I should do to you
[02:26.58]But you dance, dance, dance
[02:28.59]And ain't nobody leaving soon, so keep dancing
[02:32.53]I can't stop the feeling
[02:35.01]So just dance, dance, dance
[02:36.87]I can't stop the feeling
[02:39.24]So just dance, dance, dance
[02:41.05]I can't stop the feeling
[02:43.37]So just dance, dance, dance
[02:45.34]I can't stop the feeling
[02:47.70]So keep dancing, come on
[02:57.94]I can't stop the, I can't stop the
[03:06.49]I can't stop the, I can't stop the
[03:08.46]I can't stop the feeling
[03:09.70]Nothing I can see but you when you dance, dance, dance(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:13.55]Feeling good, good, creeping up on you
[03:15.22]So just dance, dance, dance, come on(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:18.01]All those things I should do to you
[03:19.54]But you dance, dance, dance(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:22.06]And ain't nobody leaving soon, so keep dancing
[03:26.02]Everybody sing(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:26.88]Got this feeling in my body(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:31.23]Got this feeling in my body(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:35.48]Wanna see you move your body(I can't stop the feeling)
[03:39.76]Got this feeling in my body
[03:43.35]Break it down
[03:44.20]Got this feeling in my body
[03:47.06]Can't stop the feeling
[03:48.17]Got this feeling in my body, come on
tlyric:
[by:咆哮的小清新___]
[00:08.15]这感觉渗透骨心
[00:12.28]如电流让我止不住摆动
[00:16.53]点亮这城市的夜空 让家也融乐其中
[00:20.76]屋顶也仿佛不复存在 在这氛围下的我们自由高飞自由放空
[00:24.46]阳光收进口袋 就不怕黑夜再来
[00:27.42]用首劲歌让拖沓的脚步也快起来
[00:29.51]让血液也跟着这节奏澎湃
[00:33.93]眼前的一切都跳动得飞快 快得眼睛都睁不开
[00:38.08]你会爱上这感觉这节拍 就别停下来
[00:42.00]看这灯光下的一切流光溢彩
[00:46.18]当我向你靠近 你会情不自禁不想躲开
[00:50.46]接下来怎么做我想你都明白
[00:54.77]就尽情感受这节拍 尽情畅想 敞开心怀
[00:59.82]当你舞动 那影影绰绰间的美妙就占据我的脑海
[01:03.64]这美妙感觉也会在不知不觉间向你涌来
[01:05.74]所以就把手给我 尽情舞动 大胆放开
[01:08.28]我只想与你共舞 然后拥你入怀
[01:10.31]就把手给我 尽情舞动 大胆放开
[01:12.19]不必担心 身边的人都会在 就继续舞动开怀
[01:15.92]无法抗拒这感觉 无法停止的畅快
[01:18.55]就把手给我 尽情舞动 大胆放开
[01:20.26]这无法抗拒的感觉 无法停止的畅快
[01:22.74]就把手给我 尽情舞动 别停下来
[01:25.57]噢 这如魔法般的畅快感
[01:28.67]流动在我身体 无处不在 向你袭来
[01:32.94]让我无法抗拒 也不想抗拒
[01:37.20]任它带我自由高飞自由放空 屋顶也仿佛不复存在
[01:40.94]将阳光收进口袋 就不怕黑夜再来
[01:43.76]用首劲歌让拖沓的脚步也快起来
[01:46.00]让血液也跟着这节奏澎湃
[01:50.33]眼前的一切都跳动得飞快 快得眼睛都睁不开
[01:54.57]你会爱上这感觉这节拍 就别停下来
[01:58.39]看这灯光下的一切流光溢彩

[02:06.91]接下来怎么做我想你都明白

[03:08.46]无法抗拒这感觉 无法停止的畅快
[03:09.70]当你舞动 那影影绰绰间的美妙就占据我的脑海
[03:13.55]这美妙感觉也会在不知不觉间向你涌来

[03:19.54]就把手给我 尽情舞动 别停下来(我无法抗拒这感觉)
[03:22.06]不必担心 身边的人都会在 就继续舞动开怀

[03:26.88]它流进血液(无法停止这畅快)
[03:31.23]它渗入骨心(无法停止这畅快)
